mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT b.title, b.content, b.image, b.date, u.id, u.username, u.password, u.email FROM board b INNER JOIN user u ON b.userid=u.id WHERE b.id=${id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, image, imagePath, date) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{imagePath}, now());
